page.title: 10Clubs in Alresford.
page.content: There are many community groups and facilities in Alresford, these include clubs such as the playgroup, toddlers group, Womens Institute, Derby and Joan Club and various old-peoples meetings.The only recreation in Alresford is the Village Hall, where clubs such as the weekly keep-fit class take place.Other village clubs include the Scouts, Cubs, Brownies and Guides, football and angling clubs and the jogging group, from which several people take part in the Colchester and London marathon. For those who wish to attend art and craft clubs, there are facilities of this type in Wivenhoe, such as the pottery group. The church organises several Youth activities including a sunday school, a Young Peoples Fellowship and Path- finders.For cultural activities res- idents have to travel to Colchester.
